body.name: Set of 2 (TWO) Fullway HP108 All-Season Passenger Car High Performance Radial Tires-215/50R17 215/50ZR17 215/50/17 215/50-17 95W Load Range XL 4-Ply BSW Black Side Wall UTQG 380AA
body.description: Attention! Due to the size of the tires, Packages might be SEPARATED in the courier facility and not be DELIVERED on the SAME DAY, even though we do ship them together. All tracking information can be checked on courier's website Fullway HP108The Fullway HP108 is a performance and high performance, all season tire manufactured for passenger vehicles and SUVs. Some sizes of this model feature reinforced sidewalls, which guard the rim from accidental curb damage. This model promotes great year round traction, while also resisting hydroplaning. A quiet, smooth and comfortable drive is guaranteed, as the tread design cancels out road noise and reduces vibrations. The better surface contact boosts the controllability and ensures the driver’s control over the vehicle. The HP108 enhances the tire’s high speed performing durability and promotes a safer high speed driving experience.FeaturesAll Season Tire – The tire has excellent all weather surface traction and road grip by utilizing the tread design and the compound.Rim Protector – Some sizes feature built-in rim protectors in the sidewall of the tire, effectively guarding the rims from any accidental curb damage.Quiet Ride – The tire’s tread pattern maximizes its surface contact area, greatly lowering the road noise levels heard in the vehicle’s cabin.Hydroplaning – The circumferential grooves actively prevent hydroplaning by dispersing water and slush from below the tire’s footprint.Handling – The ideal tread’s surface contact increases the safer steering responsiveness and driving stability with the better road contact.Performance – The optimal tire structure stabilizes the tire against the driving pressure affecting it during its high speed performance.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fullway Tires: Innovation, Integrity, Endeavor and Dedication Fullway tires are manufactured by Qingdao, one of China's premier tire manufacturers. Established in 2003, Fullway researched the market and found that drivers sought high-performance all-season tires for sedans, coupes, minivans, and crossovers. Today, Fullway makes a full line of trailer and light truck/SUV tires, focusing on quality, performance, and affordability. Fullway has a dealer and distribution network worldwide, with the same values of integrity, innovation, and quality that they have built a reputation on. So if you're looking for excellent performance that's budget-friendly, you can't go wrong with Fullway tires.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great price, amazing fast delivery. Looks really good. Will see down the line how good it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They were easy to mount highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great ride/handling at a very low price.
reviews.reviewText: Purchased 2 tires for winter, drive tires were getting low on tread. Liked them enough to buy 2 more. Balanced easily and ride/ handle great. Time will tell how well they last, but at 1/3 the cost of the OEM tires I'll take the chance. Performance in snow is better than OEM Michelin as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good tire great price.
reviews.reviewText: Used these tires on my S60, ride and handling better that the tires that I replaced. Nice and quiet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very happy, satisfied, excellent performance. Exceeded my expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Refuse to replace their defective tire
reviews.reviewText: One tire was defective when I had Walmart install them...1 tire was fine, the second tire, when inflating, sprung a giant air bulge in the side of the tire. I made contact with the seller and he said the tire was cut or punctured during installation and they will not replace the tire.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Deal for money
reviews.reviewText: Good deal, lots of tread, little noisy, but feel they will quite down in wear

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Decent tire if in a pinch for money, BUT Read FULL review !
reviews.reviewText: Let's start with the tire review first. The tires are decent for the price. Hard to beat. If your in a tight budget for tires then I do recommend them. As for the mileage I will keep tabs and updating them as I go along. They have very flexible sidewalls for a V rated tire. Easy to mount. I do notice since that have a soft sidewall they give off body roll compared to my winter tires. Which is very odd considering the V rating on the tire. They do give slight nose but not bad. So far not too bad in the rain but I prefer the Achille Sport over these tires in rain and HANDLING anyday.NOW for the seller of these tires I am very disgusted with them. They listed 2 tires for a price and stated there were 2 tires per set. So i Ordered 2 sets totaling 4 tires. Upon receiving the tires I only get 2 tires total. I have emailed them and they are a very huge company and after I tell them my situation they replay back that it was an error and they will not make it right. That is misleading customers in every way possible and then no attempt to fix the situation. I had to order 2 more tires from another company to match these to have a full set of 4 to put on my subaru awd car. I am contacting the BBB with a complaint and I have my attorney provided with every piece of information that backs up my statement here. So buyers BEWARE OF THIS COMPANY. THEY ONLY INTEND TO MISLEAD CUSTOMERS AND REFUSE TO MAKE THINGS RIGHT. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED ! ! !
